Package core

Class Restaurant

  • Object
    • Restaurant
  • public class Restaurant
extends Object
    This class acts as a database for all restaurant data objects declared in the DataType enumerator. Contains a map that maps data types to a list dedicated to each data type. Allows the generation of unique ID for the sake of data storage in text files. Stores the staff ID using the current application session.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private Map<DataType,​List<? extends RestaurantData>> dataListMap
      Maps data types to their respective dedicated list.
      private Map<DataType,​Comparator<? extends RestaurantData>> defaultComparatorMap
      Maps data types to a default comparator each.
      private int sessionStaffId
      ID of the staff running the restaurant application.
      private Map<DataType,​Integer> uniqueIdMap
      Maps data types to an unique ID integer each.

      Initialises all hash-maps used in this class.

    • Field Detail

      • dataListMap

        private Map<DataType,​List<? extends RestaurantData>> dataListMap
        Maps data types to their respective dedicated list.

      • defaultComparatorMap

        private Map<DataType,​Comparator<? extends RestaurantData>> defaultComparatorMap
        Maps data types to a default comparator each. The comparators are used to sort the respective lists for each data type. The default comparator sorts by ID, a mandatory property for every restaurant data object.

      • uniqueIdMap

        private Map<DataType,​Integer> uniqueIdMap
        Maps data types to an unique ID integer each. Unique ID generation is handled using a set and generate function in this class.

      • sessionStaffId

        private int sessionStaffId
        ID of the staff running the restaurant application.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Restaurant

        Restaurant()
        Initialises all hash-maps used in this class. Initialises and assigns a list to each data type declared in the DataType enumerator.
        Type Parameters:
        X - Constrains all lists to only be able to hold a RestaurantData object, or any of its sub-classes.
        See Also:
        DataType

    • Method Detail

      • isDataTypeExists

        public boolean isDataTypeExists​(DataType dataType)
        Checks if the given data type has a list dedicated to it.
        Parameters:
        dataType - Data type enum value to check
        Returns:
        True / False

      • setDefaultComparator

        public <X extends RestaurantData> void setDefaultComparator​(DataType dataType,
                                                            Comparator<X> comparator)
        Overwrites the default comparator for list sorting when retrieving data. Data is sorted whenever it is retrieved.
        Type Parameters:
        X - classes should be sub-classes of RestaurantData
        Parameters:
        dataType - data type set the default comparator to
        comparator - comparator to overwrite
